text: Akos's document <https://app.hellosign.com/home/manage?guid=80bbaf872303a68c6b8e663db0bc3a0c443326ea|CBTC Early Bird Holder Credential> was just signed by <mailto:oliver@registerlabs.io|oliver@registerlabs.io>!

Good morning :slightly_smiling_face:

I just came with a few updates on the canton-billing admin.

• I removed the List clients page because that was useless. Instead the Search clients page got a few fancy features.
• I added a button to the Search page called "Get All Local", that is a shortcut to list all our existing clients with one click. You don't have to fill anything, just click on it. _On the other hand the Search still works as it was. Fill the input field with anything and click on Search._
• On the Search page I changed the click behaviour on the list element. If you click on a party_id it will now open up a new tab instead of reload the current tab, so you won't loose the search what you already got. That is just a minor usability update.
• On the client's details page now you can find the *up-to-date balance.* It should be visible for all of the clients which is local. _(If the balance is not present, that is because we do not have the client in the database. If that's the case and you really need that balance. ping me.)_
• *The best update is the Unfunded flag. Now you can see already in the Search list if the client is unfunded, also if you click in the client's details you will see the flags below the balance.*
Notes on the unfunded flag:
• The system marks the client if it couldn't make the periodic transfer. So it marks the client also if the balance is like 0.23234, because that is NOT enough to make the periodic transfer. 
• Once the client get funds, it takes like 20 min to the unfunded flag to get away. So this is not real time. BUT, if you click on the client's details you can see the funds immediately, that is accurate and real-time. So if you see the funds like 119837.0603430612 CC and there is the unfunded flag, the flag will disappear in 20 min for sure.

elements.text: I just came with a few updates on the canton-billing admin.
I removed the List clients page because that was useless. Instead the Search clients page got a few fancy features.
I added a button to the Search page called "Get All Local", that is a shortcut to list all our existing clients with one click. You don't have to fill anything, just click on it.
On the other hand the Search still works as it was. Fill the input field with anything and click on Search.

On the Search page I changed the click behaviour on the list element. If you click on a party_id it will now open up a new tab instead of reload the current tab, so you won't loose the search what you already got. That is just a minor usability update.
On the client's details page now you can find the
It should be visible for all of the clients which is local.
(If the balance is not present, that is because we do not have the client in the database. If that's the case and you really need that balance. ping me.)
The best update is the Unfunded flag. Now you can see already in the Search list if the client is unfunded, also if you click in the client's details you will see the flags below the balance.
The system marks the client if it couldn't make the periodic transfer. So it marks the client also if the balance is like 0.23234, because that is NOT enough to make the periodic transfer.

Once the client get funds, it takes like 20 min to the unfunded flag to get away. So this is not real time. BUT, if you click on the client's details you can see the funds immediately, that is accurate and real-time. So if you see the funds like 119837.0603430612 CC and there is the unfunded flag, the flag will disappear in 20 min for sure.

As we discussed I added a new field where there is an estimation on how many days left for the clients while they have funds. That's actually good timing, because there are a few who only has like ~8 days.

Note: I changed the +14 to display the whole number.
